law.text: There is hereby created a trust and agency account in the State Treasury to be known as the "Crematory Licensure and Regulation Fund," which shall consist of all moneys received from fees under KRS 367.97504, from civil penalties assessed under this section, and from earnings on investments of these fees and civil penalties. The funds in this account shall not lapse and shall be continuously appropriated to the Attorney General for the administration of KRS 367.97501 to 367.97537.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 140, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1994.
